content.detailedDescription:
My nephew took two almost consecutives pictures to the clouds.
when he downloaded those pictures he realized about an object on the right side above the cables  in the second shot.
pay my attention a hole in the clouds that appear in the second photograph, it does not appear in the previous shot.
we do not know what is that object.
those photographs where taken in buenos aires , argentina ,ciudad de  isidro casanova ( isidro casanova town).
content.summary: Object appear in a photograph after download it on the computer.

content.detailedDescription:
i did not witness , on front page of local news paper , four credible people , two sightings , one with militery jets in chase .
            stephenville empire tribune 1-10-08
content.summary: Huge object high rate of speed chased by military ac

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back from northern california on hwy 395, my friend and i noticed some strange colored clouds and he decided to take pictures of the clouds. while we were reviewing them to see if they turned out, we came across one photo that captured something that we had not seen while taking the pictures. we don't know what it is and never acutally saw it with our own eyes but it turned up on the photograph.
content.summary: Taking pictures of clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my work truck east on bellvue toward hwy 59. to my left 
500- 1000ft  high 1 mile or 2 north i saw  what looked like a stainless  hotel serving dish 
 i reached for the cb radio to see if the other drivers were seeing the same thing . when i looked back it was gone in less than 3 seconds  didn't see it leave, looked far and wide it was not there and im not prone to dilusions
                         kevin burris
content.summary: Looked like stainless serving dish 1000ft up 2 miles north of position

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my brother who lives on lake havasu.  it was mid january of approx 1992. he and a couple of friends and i, decided to take his party boat out for a midnight fishing trip. weather was cool and cristal clear. the stars were sparkling as is common in arizona desert.  i thought it was very nice and refreshing being from alaska. we fished for a while trying different locations on the lake. when i looked up for some reason, probably just to marvel at the stars, a very bright star got my attention. since i was not familiar with the lake i ask my brother if the bright star might be venus or some other star in that position in the sky.  he assured me it could not be. we continued watching it for 10 minutes or so and marveled at its luminosity, as it stood motionless in the sky.  i jokenly said it was probably just a ufo, and we all laughed. all of us were still discussing its possibility when it took off as if shot from a cannon and dissapeared in about 3-5 seconds in a quartering and away direction from us. i have no idea how large the thing  was or how far from us it was. i hold a commercial pilot license and have seen a lot of plane but this one i can't explain.  there was not much else to do so we continued fishing for a while longer and then called it a night.
content.summary: Very bright star

content.detailedDescription: It was september on a sunday in 1973 (approximate date) i was horse back riding that after noon it was getting late in the day so i headed home my family had to go to church that night as i turned my hours loose in the pasture i looked up tward the south south east and saw what looked like a silver sphere just setting in the sky there was no movement at all i thought that was strange because the wind was starting to blow because rain was trying to move into the area i watched it for some time and then i had to get ready for church i hurried so i could go back outside to watch it somemore i told my dad to come look and he said he thought it was a balloon of some kind but it still did not move even with the wind the way it was when we headed to church we had to drive 12 miles to paris arkansas because we lived in subiaco this thing paced us all the way when we arrived at church i went inside to get 2 of my friends when we came outside all 3 of us saw this thing turn red and streek out of sight
content.summary: Sphere silver at first it later turned red and streeked off like something out of star trek

content.detailedDescription: I 'd like to start off by saying i'm very disapointed with mufon and george knapp the famous ufo investigator. i reported the following on 12/13/07 and have yet to hear anything on was i believe was the most incredible sighting i've ever heard. to think it happened to me boggles my mind. here we go again. i was leaving for an appointment when the sound of an aircraft caught my attention. i looked up at the aircraft and as i saw the aircraft it was headed west but had already started to make a turn north behind the aircraft were four objects which i could only describe as balloons, they were gray in color and sphere shaped. in looking back at this event i recall around the the gray area was what appeared to be a very thin black circle and then a circle of incadescent light. the sun was behind me and i'm guessing the sun was reflecting off the objects. as the aircraft continued to make its turn they stopped which really made me believe they were balloons when from above my head way up high i saw 5 more objects same grey color with the black circle around it with a sunset color surrounding it. i assumed it was reflecting the sunset from 3 hours out further west. all of a sudden the first four objects broke off into two pair and shot off at high speed catching up to the aircraft which had made its full turn north and was at least two miles ahead of these objects. they were 100-200 feetoff the wingtips in less than two seconds.Then the remaining five objects appeared to form a semi circle in the air and created a straight line next to each other and with incredible speed flew side by side to the rear of the aircraft forming a v formation.Perhap a few hundred feet behind the aircraft. i believe this aircraft had taken off from nellis airforce base perhaps at 1:58 i saw the event at 2:04.I am a veteran and have seen many aircraft these objects had no noise,no vapor trails.No emissions. no wings .Just grey circular sphere type objects .Thanks for letting me report this again.After digesting what i saw this report is in mucher greater detail
content.summary: 9 objects hovering in the sky and speeding off with incredible speed

content.detailedDescription:
In the night two sphere in the sky parallel move slowly in ponce area less 2000 ft move in one moment one to north and other south and the light
off and on and other big red ball with fire move in the same area many days after.Many people see and the airplane move around big red ball fire.
this big ball red fire move in zig zag and stop more the 20 minute and move again to the south west slowly and repeat the same one hour later.
and repeat the same other days.
content.summary: Big fire ball with spheres

content.detailedDescription: I was riding on patterson road with my mom in her car. we were coming back from shopping and we were almost to our house. we were listening to the radio and i was sitting in the passenger's seat looking out the window. the sun was setting in the west, and there were storm clouds to the east. i was watching the beautiful clouds when i noticed that on the corner of the highest cloud there was a round object just sitting there. i had no idea what it was, so i watched it for a while more. the clouds kept shifting and growing larger. the object darted around inside the clouds and around the clouds, as though it was trying to hide inside the clouds. it looked orange and red, and looked metallic. it didn't have any lights on it. i told my mom to turn off the radio and look out the window at the sky. she spotted the object too and slowed down the car, but we didn't get out. it was very high up and didn't attempt to come any farther down, it just kept darting around. one second it would be on one side of the storm system, and then it would dart and disappear. then, it would reappear on the other side of the storm system. my mom and i watched until the ball zoomed off into a cloud and didn't reappear. it was very weird and we were shaken when we got home. odd.
content.summary: A redish, orange sphere that looked metallic with no blinking lights was dodging around some storm clouds east of wayland. it zoomed off and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I had just dropped my roomate off at work, turned left (going west) onto garden st in titusville.  it was approximately 6:45am.  the sun was just rising.  skies were clear over the ocean, the rivers, the cape, and the wildlife refuge.  skies over titusville were dark and heavy. in the clear part of the sky i noticed a black object which at first i thought was a pelican or some local bird, suddenly i noticed the craft moving very fast, maintaining altitude (?, i'm not even gonna take a guess) going straight across the sky in a northwest direction into the clouds.  the only way i can describe the speed is to say "it was moving about 4 or 5 times faster than an airliner appears to move in the sky.  it was fast.  it wasn't a bird!   the craft flew northwest from the clear skies, into the dark clouds over titusville.  that was it.  it was very quick, and if i hadn't been telling myself to look up more often i would have missed it.  living here at the space coast i watch every launch, shuttles and rockets, from my front yard.  i also witness air traffic from several airports including cape canaveral air force base, patrick air force base, the nasa airstrips, melbourne international, and depending on weather, sometimes oia.  ive never seen anything like this.  if anyone else saw this thing, feel free to contact me.
content.summary: Ufo traveled northwest across the indian river

content.detailedDescription: I was very young at the time about 8 or 9 years old.  it was 1988 or 1989 and in the summer.  i woke up at around 10 or 11 p.M. to a flash of light moving past my window every few seconds.  my first thought was that it was a cars' headlights flashing past my window, but it kept repeating so i got out of bed to look.  outside my window, my neighbors house is about 25 or 30 feet away, i saw what at first i thought was a ball of fire much like a comet but with a very short tail.  it was blue and reddish-orange at the same time and quite bright.  it was about the size of a vw bug.  there was no noticeable aircraft shape to it.  i remember thinking it was beautiful and watched it for at least 20 minutes.  the whole time i watched it just did the same thing, circled.  i would guess it was 30 to 40 feet off the ground.  it followed the same path, i would now say, exactly every time.  the diameter of it's orbit was about 60 to 70 feet.  i was absolutely silent.  after i watched it for some time i decided to go wake up my parents.  i woke them up and told them what i saw but they told me to go back to bed.  i then woke up my two sisters whose room is next to mine and told them.  we watched it from their window for a few minutes and they wanted to go back to sleep so i went back to my room.  i watched it for a few minutes more in my room then i got sleepy so i went back to bed.  i had pretty much forgotten about it until recently,(2007) on a family vacation, i asked my sisters if it really happened.  they totally agreed it happened and described it exactly as i had without me saying anything descriptive. my parents don't remember me waking them up but in a strange twist they told me that the neighbor lady, whose house the object circled, told them that her husband was a high ranking military officer who disappeared in the(60's or 70's?) with no explanation from the government.
content.summary: Fireball like ufo circles neighbors house for about 2 hours

content.detailedDescription:
After breakfast with my wife, i left the house to start my car and allow it to warm up. as i was approaching my car lights in the sky caught my attention. at first i thought it may be a airplane, but something about the way its was moving did not seem normal. i was a aircraft mechanic in the airforce for 10 years, and have observed most all military and civilian aircraft in flight during all times of the day and night, but this object was moving slow and made a 90 degree right angle turn to the  north, as it was moving westward away from me. its horizontal pitch did not change as would a aircraft, during a banking motion with its wings.
 i then observed it make another 90 degree turn back in the westward direction , to again move directly away from me as i was facing west.
 i noticed that due to the trees, land grade west of my home i would not be able to observe it much longer, so i re-entered my home in hope that my wife would have a chance to observe it as well.
 i said to her as i walked in, honey come to the window, i looked out of a westward facing window of the house and could not observe it, my wife was now standing with me, i thought that the lights of the kitchen may be preventing us from observing it, so as she stood there looking , i took approximately 3 steps and turned off the light switch.
 i heard her say oh my god, and turned back to the window, but what she observed was already gone. she stated that what she saw was a small round ball of white light traveling at an amazing speed apearing from over our house heading westward, i asked her where did she last see it and she pointed directly in the direction of where i last observed the large oval shaped object earlier before re-entering my home.
 she said it did not appear to be a meteor, i did not see what she described, but it appears that the object she saw was not the same object i had observed.

i do not know what we saw , she had no idea as well, but we both know that we have never before observed anything like this.

when i arrived at work, this morning i asked some employees who live near me if they noticed anything, unusual while they were traveling to work and no one said they noted anything unusual.
content.summary: Oval composure of different colored lights, yellowish to amber horizontally and surronded by white lights in a oval  patter.

content.detailedDescription:
At my rural friend's house enjoying an outdoor camp fire with my wife, child, and friends, and looking into distant clear night summer sky, (zero clouds) about 50 degrees upward and in the western sky, several of us (6-8 people)saw what appeared to be star-like distant "light" similar to what a star looks like unmagnified; except it appeared to cross the entire panoramic sky 90 degees from direct west to direct north. and, at an upward distance appearing about the same distance as the stars, though it likely wasn't i'd guess. this took only about 40 seconds for this "lighted object" to cross all the way from west to north a full 90 degrees. as the night was clear as a bell, and the nearest town is a half hour drive away, let's just say there were no optical distortions in the way of viewing what we all viewed. as i appeared to notice the object first, i called everyone's attention to this bizarre sight/light and said, "what the fuck is that"???

the distance was obviously far too high for any satellite, plane, etc. we guessed, and the speed was simply astonishing. the meteoric speed is what caught our/my attention to the object in the first place. 

however, meteors do not come to a decidedly zig-zaggy tailed dead stop, then change direction 90 degrees to "straight up", then proceed to rise higher yet into the sky at astonishing (non-earthly acceleration and inertial moment of torque displayed) speed, and straight up out of complete visual sight. 

i have never seen anything remotely like this in my lifetime, and may never again. but you could not now tell me there are not unexplainable objects traversing our skies! as i am my own best witness, and generally believe nothing of what i hear, maybe half of what i read, and generally all of what i see with my decidedly mechanical engineering eyes, you could not convince me that any earth designed object has control of its field effects similar to the object we saw.

obviously, we had wished it would have been close enough to make out any details of the object. (which we could not) basically just a bright far light from where we were. think though; at the distance this was at, and the ability to go 90 degrees in the short time elapsed, means this object at it's height of travel, had to travel likely several thousand miles to achieve the angled trajectory of 90 degree radial travel in the time/distance covered at the height observed. it would take quite a craft to achieve this. i would guess anyone with this level of technology, has the ability to control their phase relationship to eath's gravitational force and "simply" manipulate the phase angle and field effects to their own advantage for omnidirectional propulsion purposes. this would also explain the craft "silence" many seem to indicate in their respective sightings.

i've never been much into scoping out any ufo possibilities, but also have no reason not to assume they are not only real, but far advanced compared to to our meager low tech existance. it would stand to reason.
unless some are so indignant they believe themselves to own the universe?
hardly i'd guess.

our experience was the most unusual physics event i've ever witnessed personally.
i don't convince easily either. had i not witnessed this myself, i simply would hold out room for another explanation. certainly not what i/we witnessed!!

dan
content.summary: Star distant object crossed sky,(90 deg.) came to stop, shot straight up out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: Ilooked out my kitchen window uo to check weather and saw a circle shaped object flying at a southbound dir appx 3000ft alt  no sound went outside to my truck  to gt binoculars watchd it until i lost site of it
content.summary: Looked out window and it was there

content.detailedDescription: This is another video from tonight there are three stars to the left of the object and a passing plane above, the object is rising in elevation and gives off red & white light.
content.summary: Same object better video

content.detailedDescription: On december 24th my husband and i were returning home from visiting our daughter at approximately 7:30 and we noticed what appeared to be a very bright star to the right of the full moon.  i took a picture with my digital camera and when i zoomed in to the object it was not a star. i took a second picture thinking something might have been on my lens.  the object appeared again except the shape was slightly different. it seemed to have moved around a bit.  it looked like a gold metal object with legs.  my husband said it reminded him of a chandelier.  it had to be very large because the full moon did not drown it out.  we watched it for about 15 minutes and then went inside the house because it was very cold.  i don't know how long it was up there. i would appreciate any information as to what this object might be.
content.summary: Star like object seen near full moon.  photo shows it's not a star.  unsure what it is.

content.detailedDescription: On december 24th my husband and i were returning home from visiting our daughter at approximately 7:30 and we noticed what appeared to be a very bright star to the right of the full moon.  i took a picture with my digital camera and when i zoomed in to the object it was not a star. i took a second picture thinking something might have been on my lens.  the object appeared again except the shape was slightly different. it seemed to have moved around a bit.  it looked like a gold metal object with legs.  my husband said it reminded him of a chandelier.  it had to be very large because the full moon did not drown it out.  we watched it for about 15 minutes and then went inside the house because it was very cold.  i don't know how long it was up there. i would appreciate any information as to what this object might be.
content.summary: Star like object seen near full moon.  photo shows it's not a star.  unsure what it is.

content.detailedDescription: I saw the exact same object i saw on friday, tonight above the mountain to the southeast of my front door. video is focused on a star and i turn the digital camera to right and pick up the object.
content.summary: Saw the same object agian tonight

content.detailedDescription:
Been working in law enforcement field for 15 years. currently employed as a campus safety officer for a prominent university and was walking a beat on the far north end of the campus. near a scenic overlook you can look across the city and view the sky from the west(mountain range) and as far east as brighton, co. i'm currently a student pilot and aviation buff most of my life and pride myself in identifying aircraft. this airship was like nothing i had ever seen or could have ever imagined. it moved across the sky from west to northeast in a consistant, silent and extremely smooth flight path. i estimate its altitude at just below 7000 feet, and i know this because i checked the current ceiling after the event with a online aviation weather site immediately after the sighting, and it showed a ceiling of 7031 ft. the object appeared to be be skimming just underneath the ceiling. again this object was totally silent and displayed no evidence of lights or propulsion thrust what so ever. i estimated its size to be larger then a c-5a galaxy at 7000 ft. which is a extremely large military aircraft. the skin of the aircraft was a high sheen chrome which reflected the ground lights of the city as it passed over lighted landmarks. i first noticed the object somewhere near rocky flats goverment facility just south of jeffco airport. it seemed to appear out of the haze very slowly i estimate around 70 knots and as it dropped below the reported ceiling it appeared to have a very distinct dark black wing shaped outline against the haze now just above it. as it cleared the coud cover it assumed the crystal clear reflection of the early morning lighted city terrain, and only the wing portion of the object displayed this reflective ability and the rest of the object appeared to be a flat black ,non-reflective similar to our current day stealth aircraft. the design and shape of this object was very aerodynamic with no defined edges and very sleek.It remained at this altitude and never changed course through the entire 10-15 minute observation and disappeared in the haze again i estimate somewhere over brighton colorado. 
    a about a week later i had told my brother about the sighting and he advised me he had seen a object around the same time of morning only a week later traveling in the same direction ,silent and his description was very similar. the most consistant was the reflective ability of the wing portion of the object. i thought at first it was a stealth bomber but quickly found that not to be possible it was not like any aircraft i had ever seen before and flew and moved with silent motion. i found myself very curious after the sighting and found myself trying to justify what it was.I would be able to provide a drawing upon request
content.summary: Hazzy overcast morning (7000  ft ceiling) abnormally calm, no sound,  wing shaped object metalliac chrome and black moved across sky from southwest to northeast at approx.7000 ft.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving in tractor trailer.  noticed fairly large, bright oval red light flash, followed by a light neon green light flash in different shape.  too dark to see any object.  just consistant alternate flashing of red and green.

staired at it for a few minutes to see if it was lights coming from top of the mountain but seemed to stay in the same position as we were driving.  may have been about 500 feet in the air.  we were traveling very slow about 20 miles an hour due to ice on the road.  i continued to stare for about 3-4 minutes as we drove.  decided to pull my camera out and take a picture but as soon as i got it ready the lights turn off and there was just blackness.

as i stared at the flashing light i tried to think of an explanation.  the red was very bright but the green was a color i had not seen before.  seemed to have some line pattern such as a static electricity ball.
there was no sound.
content.summary: Bright oval red light flash, followed by neon green light.... alternating

content.detailedDescription: I'm sorry but i can't remember exact date. butin summer of 1993 i came home from work around 9pm. a little while later approx. 10-11pm i went outside on back steps and smoked a cigarette. as i looked to the sky i noticed it was very starry night, more than normal due to city lights comming from downtown cincinnati. i looked to the northwest towards covington ky, southern downtown cincy. and this object very wide at about the 2 o'clock position in the sky, was slowly heading towards me. when i first spotted it i thought it was a giant glidder, but as it was moving closer, the size was huge! not just wing to wing, but also front to back. as the ufo nearly directly over me, little did i know this moment would haunt me the rest of my life. due to i've never told my family or friends about this night, and i'v got to relive this sighting without being able to talk to somebody who doesn't think i'm going nut's. ok so the object is directly over approx 750-1000 ft. above me moving no more than 30-40 mph.It made zero sounds! the object size was sorta arrowhead shaped and thin built roughly 300 ft. wide slightly smaller maybe 200-250 ft.Long. thickness was approx.50 ft. thick.It has a white light on bottom of each wing, and 1 near front. light's were very dim. as i watched ojbect it continued to slowly cruise overhead until if finally went beyond horizen. my final thought's, if somebody had expierienced that same event or knows someone that does, please contact me
content.summary: Giant low flying arrowhead shape object  summer of 93 near downtown cincinnati

content.detailedDescription: January 5th 2008 i awoke at 06:00a.M. because i had to be at my son's house at 07:00 to take his dogs to the vet.  i remember feeling a little shaken about what i had just dreamed because i've never experienced it before.  i dreamt that i was standing on the bottom of the ocean with 2 men who looked like normal human men.  i could'nt figure out why i could still breath air normally as if i were on land.  the men also breathed normally.  i did'nt feel the water or any pressure surrounding my body and was somewhat afraid because i know that we all need scuba gear to go into the ocean.  the man made me feel safe.  he told me with his mind that we were 4700 ft below the ocean on the floor.  it was dark except for the light that came from the immediate area where these men and myself were.  the one man handed me an almost perfect circle that was light green with an indention in the center.  it had a blue ring that hugged the circle or almost circle because it had a straight end to it.  picture the round weights used on a benchpress bar.  the weight is round but sliced off on one end. he said to me "this is argon.  take this to your scientist.  it will provide energy to light cities for 1000 years.  the use of argon for energy will save the planets resources".  i took the circle in my hands and began to go up but became afraid and let it go saying to the man, "if i go up to fast i'll get the bends".  he said to me "don't be afraid, you will go to the surface slowly".  when i surfaced i was i say a city with alot of industrial buildings.  i don't know how to decribe it because i felt displaced.  the surface water was dark.  i saw myself taking this object to a scientist who asked me "where did you get this"?  i woke up at that point.  when i got to my sons house i asked him, "what is argon"?  he said, "that's a gas, why"?  i told him about my dream and that's what he dismissed it as, a dream.  i'm not a scientist but my interest was peaked so i looked in the internet wanting to know what argon is and how it's used.  this is why i'm writing to you because there is no way i could invent this.  i'm 52 years old and this is the first time a dream has made me feel like there's hope for our planet.  thank you.
content.summary: I don't know if dreams count but i know that i could not think of these things because i am not a scientist.  i will describe what i saw in my dream in the following block.

content.detailedDescription: The picture was taken on a clear day and appeared only after downloaded into computer.  this picture was previously submitted to ufo casebook.  in viewing the photo from argentina  we noticed some resemblance to our photo.
content.summary: Resembles ufo from argentina submitted today.

content.detailedDescription: Driving to college of marin on hwy 101 in morning as i crested the hill where i could see the maring county civic center i thought that the highway ahead looked odd, not right as i continued to drive a bright sky blue color repalced the road ahead which changed to prussian blue and then silver as i approached the civic center. then irealized that a large object was spanning the width of the highway which was at the time four lanes wide. traffic was balled up at the object where the cars were passing under it  itw as about 10 ft above the highway and at first i thought that it was a bridge put up over night some how.  as i got to the object irealized that iyt had a screen on arms in front of it that projected an image of the ascene behind it in effcet hiding it form view until you were riught on top of it.  the bottm of the craft was very irregular and probably the screen was pull up under the craft in flight  it was very effective in hiding the craft.  people were all looking up and i had to drive carefull not thave an accident and did not get to loo all i wanted to look  this wa during the morning rush hour traffic and thousnads saw the ufo yet nothing was in the news any where  i was in a daze and continued to drive on and wish now i had gone back to look more in detail.  years later my sister and her children saw a ufo of the same size in the same place doing the same thing and no one on the highway noticed it at all.  my sister was on a side road and she was stopped and got out and could have bounced a ball off the thing.  military helicopters showed up and chased the thing around the area and then they took off north chasing the ufo.  this was at low altitude and in clear daylight .  nothing was in the news.  a family friend who lived in the immediate area as a child said that at times in the night goblins would take her out of the window of her bedroom and they would dance in the moon light.  she was serious about it.  one could ask what they wanted so badly a the civic center.  picking up or dropping off someone?
content.summary: About 1969 driving south on 101 towards marin county civic center a large ufo hovered over the morning traffic at an altitude of 10 feet thousands saw it yet not on news

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house on new years eve when i saw four orange-yellow dots in a perfect square flying uniformly from east to south west. we got another person out to see them with us. the dots continued west towards the horizon over the ocean they broke formation one at a time and disappeared a couple of second apart. i first noticed them when i was looking a the stars. i was amazed i though it was awesome. i was pretty curious about what i had seen.
content.summary: Small dots orange  four in a square

content.detailedDescription: I was on vacations, taking a series of images to compose a panorama. didn't see it or hear it when i was there, to my surprise just found then later on the picture. based on exif data between this and the previous picture, object was seen less than eight seconds. it appears moving fast, thou any object travelling such a distance in a such a short time should have made some noise i guess. probably didn't see it because picture was taken with optical zoom. shutter speed 1/1250 iso 80 aproximate event location: cordoba state, near extint volcanoes zone, unpopulated place, 31���21'34.30"s  65���10'39.90"w (-31.356569;-65.155706) nnw direction. cordoba state is well known for ufo sightings, thou i've never seen any, and i've always been doubtfull about other people capacity to distinguish satellites or other common moving objects.
content.summary: Very fast oval object appeared on picture.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a lighted object rising up from a mountain to the southeast from my front door aroun 8:15 pm est. the light emitted (not blinking) was white, blue and red and it slowly rose from the top of the mountain and continued to climb slowly to a higher elevation. i used binoculars and saw a small light hovering in one area then moving slowly to a higher elevation. i took a video with a sony digital camera but was unable to view the object thru the display screen so i only got it on the very end of this video. the camera was moving not the object. the last frame shows the object on top with a small star below it.
content.summary: Light hovering over mountain for approx 1 1/2 hours

content.detailedDescription:
I made ~1000 series photographs from the sky, for testig my new camera. after downloading stuff to pc, i noticed unusual object on 12 pictures. 

best wishes!
content.summary: Circle object appears and vanish

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my bike one day on my street by myself when i looked up and noticed a silver circular dot traveling in a straight line about 30-40 thousand feet up i havent reported it until now because no one belives me i wasnt quite sure what to make of it back then but im postive of what i saw now that i look back at it.
content.summary: Silver and high in the air
